triples.name: Linear Temporal Logic
triples.relevance: Core specification language for defining temporal planning requirements in multi-robot systems.

triples.name: Optimal Control
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a new optimal control synthesis algorithm from temporal logic specifications.

triples.name: Motion Planning
triples.relevance: Core problem being solved: synthesizing optimal motion plans for large-scale multi-robot systems.

triples.name: BÃ¼chi Automaton
triples.relevance: Used to guide sampling through transitions leading to accepting states in temporal logic synthesis.

triples.name: Graph Traversal
triples.relevance: Existing graph search techniques on product automata that the new algorithm improves upon.

triples.name: Automaton
triples.relevance: Product automaton construction for synchronizing multiple robots in temporal logic planning.

triples.name: Model Checking
triples.relevance: Existing model checking tools that cannot handle the large state spaces that the proposed algorithm can handle.
